subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Helio Castroneves, a three-time Indy 500 winner, is 14th in the drivers’ standings and has not been able to finish higher than seventh in the first three races.
snippet: Helio Castroneves, a three-time Indy 500 winner, is 14th in the drivers’ standings and has not been able to finish higher than seventh in the first three races.
